data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Leyte, Philippines.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Leyte, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Leyte, Philippines to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Leyte, Philippines.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 5,669 believers in Leyte, Philippines a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Tagalog-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Leyte, Philippines.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Leyte, Philippines.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Leyte access to a Bible in their own language.

location.name: Leyte
location.people_groups_list: Jama Mapun, Bajau Kagayan, Sama-Bajau, Sama, Southern, Sangil, Sama Bangingi, Northern Sama
